comments.html: Have you read the 'Cisco ASA, PIX and FWSM Firewall handbook'? I've read that one but was hoping for more information on the FWSM, specifically in transparent mode. Maybe this new book is the one I'm looking for.
comments.name: JT

comments.html: The one I've read has plenty of information on the transparent mode (including deployment and design scenarios). If that's what you're looking for, try it.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: This is really a superb books. I have not seen any book of FWSM which can explain the design & integration of FWSM.
comments.name: Shivlu Jain
